activation.title: Your account has been successfully activated.
activation.success: You can now get back to Eat Until to log you in.

resetPassword.wrongToken: The password reset link was invalid, possibly because it has already been used. Please request a new password reset.
resetPassword.explanation: Please enter your new password. If you made a mistake, request a new password reset link :)

passwordConfirm.success: Your password has been set. You may go ahead and log in now.
passwordConfirm.error: An error occured. Please request a new password reset link from the application and try again.
